name: solana
description: ![Cute Orca](https://github.com/lucas-fochesatto/caos/tree/main/frontend/public/whale.png?raw=true) ## Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAO) CAOS is a DAO implemented with Solana designed for the managment of apartment complexes, it was made to empower a building's residents, allowing them to request and vote on changes to their home, with a completely automatic and transparent system.
